attributes.action: Lower the age that an individual can join a political party from 15 to 13.
attributes.background: I am 14 and I am very keen about politics and I feel that one of the ways I can contribute to society is by joining a political party. This will allow politicians to have access to the younger generations and their views on what the destiny of this country should be, especially with a Brexit vote.

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual political parties to take, not the UK Government or Parliament.
